SEARCH
Package io.github.atreia108.vega.math

Class EulerAngles

java.lang.Object
io.github.atreia108.vega.math.EulerAngles
public class EulerAngles extends Object
Euler Angle model. These are a start on some very simple Euler angle routines. Euler angles are often used as a potentially singular method for representing rotations or attitudes. There are a lot more methods required to use Euler angles in the propagation of the rotational state of an object. However, these will provide the basic methods for going to and from a more traditional transformation matrix representation.
Author:
David Hammen, Edwin Z. Crues (edwin.z.crues@nasa.gov)
